com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.configuration.scan

Class IBeaconScanContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.configuration.scan.IBeaconScanContext

  • public final class IBeaconScanContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides description of conditions accordin to which Android device searches IBeacon device and notifies about their presence. The context provides plenty of customizations including: searching by regions, filters for IBeacon advertising packets, selection of desired event types (for more information see EventType), rssi signal manipulation, sorting devices by their distance from Android device, notifying events with updated device with specific interval

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IBeaconScanContext.Builder
      Specifies the context within which the Android device should scan iBeacon devices.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final IBeaconScanContext DEFAULT
        The DEFAULT IBeacon Scan Context includes all event types to be notified and no filters. Scan with the default predefined IBeaconScanContext notifies about every iBeacon presence regardless of its belonging to any specific Region.
